hero.subtitle: We're more than a platform – we're the bridge that brings customers and local businesses together, creating a thriving community where everyone wins.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: Born from a passion to support local businesses and help customers discover amazing deals in their community

content.title: From Idea to Impact
content.paragraph1: Wafferli started as a simple idea: what if we could make it easier for people to discover and support local businesses while saving money? Our founder, Ahmed, noticed that many amazing local businesses struggled to reach customers, while customers missed out on great deals happening right in their neighborhood.
content.paragraph2: Today, we're proud to be Kuwait's leading platform connecting communities. Every deal claimed, every business discovered, and every connection made brings us closer to our vision of a thriving local economy where everyone benefits.

foodGuide.title: The Ultimate Guide to Kuwait's Hidden Food Gems
foodGuide.excerpt: Discover the best local eateries and street food spots that only locals know about. From traditional Kuwaiti dishes to contemporary fusion cuisine.

content.p1: Kuwait's culinary scene is a treasure trove of flavors waiting to be discovered. Beyond the well-known restaurants and international chains, there's a vibrant world of hidden gems that showcase the true essence of Kuwaiti cuisine and hospitality.
content.p2: Start your culinary journey with an authentic Kuwaiti breakfast at these local favorites. From fresh balaleet (sweet vermicelli with eggs) to crispy khanfaroosh (traditional donuts), these breakfast spots serve it up just like it's been done for generations.
content.p3: Tucked away in a quiet corner of Salmiya, Um Ali's Kitchen has been serving traditional Kuwaiti breakfast for over 30 years. Their balaleet is legendary among locals, and the warm hospitality makes every visit feel like coming home.
content.p4: The real magic of Kuwait's food scene happens on the streets. From late-night shawarma stands to traditional sweets shops, these vendors have perfected their craft over decades.
content.p5: This unassuming cart has been serving the best shawarma in Kuwait for over 20 years. The secret? A special blend of spices and the perfect balance of meat, vegetables, and sauce.
content.p6: Kuwait's young generation of chefs is creating exciting fusion dishes that blend traditional flavors with international techniques. These restaurants represent the future of Kuwaiti cuisine.
content.p7: Whether you're a longtime resident or a curious visitor, these hidden gems offer an authentic taste of Kuwait that you won't find in guidebooks. Each location tells a story of tradition, innovation, and the warm hospitality Kuwait is known for.

authors.sarahBio: Food enthusiast and Kuwait native with over 10 years of experience exploring the local culinary scene. Sarah has written for various food magazines and blogs about Middle Eastern cuisine.

comments.comment1: Great article! I visited Um Ali's Kitchen and it's truly amazing. Thanks for sharing these hidden gems.
comments.comment2: As a food blogger myself, I appreciate the detailed descriptions. Abu Salem's shawarma is indeed the best in Kuwait!
comments.comment3: This makes me so proud of our local food scene. These places deserve more recognition!

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Can’t find the answer you’re looking for?
FAQ.searchPlaceholder: Search for a question or keyword...

questions.createAccount: How do I create an account?
questions.findDeals: How can I find deals near me?
questions.redeemDeals: How do I redeem a deal?
questions.joinBusiness: How can my business join Wafferli?

answers.createAccount: To create an account, click on the 'Sign Up' button at the top right of the page, enter your details, and confirm your email address.
answers.findDeals: Use the search bar or browse categories to find the latest deals near your location. You can filter results by distance or type of business.
answers.redeemDeals: Once you select a deal, click on 'Redeem' and show the generated QR code to the merchant at checkout.
answers.marketplace: The Wafferli Marketplace is a platform where you can discover special offers, seasonal discounts, and exclusive promotions from our partner businesses.
answers.joinBusiness: Businesses can join Wafferli by registering through the Business Portal. Once approved, you can list your offers and reach thousands of customers.

FAQ.supportDescription: Our support team is available to assist you with any questions or issues.
